summary: This mod is the retexture of Dawnguard armor. Now on of the greatest armors in Skyrim is in HD version.
descriptionHtml:
[url=http://jpegshare.net/][center][img]http://jpegshare.net/images/46/a0/46a0958bab41ba4e3ce19b344458bd2d.png[/img][/center][/url][left][size=4][font=Courier New]This mod is the retexture of Dawnguard armor. It's not a secret, that there is no good HD retexture of this armor on nexus. So, I decided to fix it.

I tried to make HD version of this fantastic equip and I hope you'll enjoy it.
I'm not a wizard and I'm not skillful enough to make an exact copy of vanilla armor, but, nevertheless, I think that my mod will make the dawnguard armor more attractive.


[/font][/size][font=Courier New][size=4][youtube]328pzxsp76c[/youtube][youtube]3CYg7nh95Ck[/youtube][/size][/font][size=4][youtube]TiO0zlU24kQ[/youtube][youtube]36t94zI_uOI[/youtube]

[font=Courier New][u][color=#f1c232]The list of changes[/color][/u]

-Helmet
-Armor (4 variants)
-Gloves
-Boots
-Shields[/font][/size][/left][center][url=http://jpegshare.net/][img]http://jpegshare.net/images/a1/00/a1007bd37972f8cba2ff8ecf59dc31e7.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://jpegshare.net/][img]http://jpegshare.net/images/24/47/2447a12d95d067fa32de470b954a44c3.jpg[/img][/url][/center][url=http://jpegshare.net/][center][img]http://jpegshare.net/images/17/5b/175bd79379b5772bf023ee31b0e5b0e7.jpg[/img][/center][/url]

[/url][center][url=https://flic.kr/p/r5opA2][/url][url=http://jpegshare.net/][img]http://jpegshare.net/images/bb/01/bb018210b828c94c2e2fcc4952815ac8.jpg[/img][/url][/center][center][url=http://jpegshare.net/]
